section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I also have the disposition to announce in number 73-5265, Kokoszka against Belford and in this case, the judgment of the Second Circuit is affirmed.
In Jimenez against Weinberger, the first case I announced, Mr. Justice Rehnquist filed a dissenting opinion, in the second case 5265, the judgment of the Court is unanimous.
